Brightspace-Native Video

  • Learn how to insert a video from Brightspace's File Manager into a new HTML page
    1. Open the source code editor on this page.
    2. Copy the code for the full div container below. It begins with <video width="100%" controls="controls" class="mb-4"> and contains the video location source code for the video below.
    3. Paste that code into a new HTML page.
    4. To get a new embed code from Brightspace:
      1. Go to your new course's File Manager via Course Admin.
      2. Upload the video into an appropriate folder there.
      3. Return to your new HTML page.
      4. Click the "Insert STuff" button, and navigate in the dialog box to the video in your File Manager.
      5. Important: In the last step, instead of clicking "Insert", copy the source code at the top of the dialog box.
    5. With the source code for your new video copied, return to your new HTML page.
    6. Paste the source code from Brightspace in place of the placeholder video source code found in this sample page between the quotation marks in the source tag (labeled source src=). DO NOT replace or alter any of the other parts of the video code.
    7. Click save.
